fields.message: We would like to talk with someone from the gallery. Can you give Sharon a call at 768-3602 or 671-3602? Thank you.
fields.name: Sharon McAllister, ArtFest Fort Myers

fields.message:
Was at the gallery a few weeks ago before we returned to New York City.  We are so happy you are in Ft Myers and cannot wait to return next season.  We are so excited to see the revitalization of downtown and Ft Myers to join the ranks of great cities for art.  Enjoy the summer.

Best regards,
Cynthia Calabretta

Pls. include me on your mailing list!
fields.name: cynthia calabretta

fields.message:
Hey Marcus!

I was wondering by chance if you gave me screen credit for using my article verbiage from your review for that documentary? If so, did you enter it into IMDB? If not, would that be possible?

Kind Regards,
Kriss Perras Running Waters
fields.name: Kriss Perras Running Waters

fields.message:
I'd like to connect with Marcus Jansen. I'm the director of a contemporary art gallery opening in Denver later this summer. We would love to discuss possible representation with him if he's interested. Thanks for your time, 

Sara Melzer
Mike Wright Gallery
970-393-2334
fields.name: Sara Melzer

fields.message: I saw on Craigs list you need a fine art consultant. I am perfect for  Unit A Recently moved here from CA  I am ready to get back in the art business in sales or gallerie director. Lets meet.
fields.name: JoAnn L Gallman

fields.message:
Hi, I sent a note, but am not sure if it actually sent. Could you tell me if it went through? Thank you.
Susanne
fields.name: Susanne Alexander

fields.message: Please add Kimberly, Kenny & Kyler Kouril to the VIP list for the April 5 event as guests of Jonas Stirner- thank you!
fields.name: Kimberly Kouril

fields.message:
Hi Marcus

I'm looking forward to meeting you, and DJ'ing the event coming up April 5.

Please feel free to call or email me anytime.

Thanks
Jeff
fields.name: Jeff

fields.message:
Marcus,

Please place Michael and Irene Pohlman on your VIP list for April 5 Artist's Reception and After Party.  

Thank You for the Invitation,

Michael Pohlman
fields.name: Michael Pohlman

fields.message: I will be coming to the anniversary party with 2 guests--my brother and his friend.  I'm looking forward to seeing Marcus and his amazing artwork in  the space for the first time!
fields.name: Nancy Shiarella

fields.message:
Mel Toadvine, one of our editors, received an ad from your company and forwarded it to me. I'll need to contact someone in order to get more information about placing an ad in our paper.

Thank you,

John Henderson
Business Development
fields.name: John Henderson

fields.message: I have been admiring your work on the internet.  Is the only time that one can view Unit A in Fort Myers only once a month, the first Friday of each month.  thanks
fields.name: larry O'Brien

fields.message: Please contact me at your earliest convenience - I would like to use Unit A as the venue for an event on March 30.  I can be reached at 407.694.6265.  Thank you in advance.
fields.name: Kristyn Whitlow

fields.message: Looking to rent out a space big enough for 50-75 people theatre style seating for a small hair show, two hour event.
fields.name: Ashley Torres

fields.message: Are you having an event, opening in Paris?
fields.name: Frances Young Fuchs

fields.message: I would like Marcus Jansen to manage my art career, and would love to be his apprentice.  I am serious, and I met him, his wife and manager at the Wizard of Oz - Art Basel event some years back.  He is my favorite living artist.  Som of my work is on www.anttblake.com.
fields.name: Anthony Blake

fields.message:
Hey Marc, call(454-1014) when you get a minute. Granddaughter Ripley will be here Jan 6 thru the 9th and we want to come downtown(as you suggested) to have her meet you and see your work.
                                   Slappy NewYear, G.
fields.name: George and Nancy Shiarella

fields.message: curious to see the extent of your Purvis Young collection...
fields.name: skot foreman

fields.message:
Really love your work, especially the Urban and Abstracts series -- the Urban recall James Rosenquist for some reason, although his work is so completely different. I think yours has a similar although softer energy and softer flow to it.

By the way, I also grew up in da Bronx -- the South Bronx -- and I do photography (although on the side, not full-time). I'm looking forward to attending whenever you show in NYC!
fields.name: Alexis

fields.message:
Hi Marcus,
I would love to put some of your work on my site. Please review and let me know if I have your permission.

http://www.jenren.com

Best regards,

Jenny
fields.name: Jenny Barnes
